paragraphs: I am blessed. To find my calling at the time when it is needed most is sublime. That I might join this cause at the precise moment it stands to achieve its greatest victory isn't simply fateful, it's destiny. The woman I divined in my dreams has come to us, and the purity of her heritage is beyond even our most hopeful expectations. There was more than approval in the Wakener's eyes when I presented her, there was reverence.
She has gone with him to the heart of the excavation. There he will unlock her potential. Will I see that in my dreams? Or something even greater?
